title: Microsoft Says Chief Executive Satya Nadella’s Son Has Died
sub_head: Zain Nadella was born with cerebral palsy, which CEO Satya Nadella has credited for softening his outlook on work and life
body:
The son of Microsoft Corp. Chief Executive Satya Nadella has died, a spokesperson for the company said Tuesday.
“Very sadly Satya’s son Zain Nadella has passed away. The Nadellas are taking time to grieve privately as a family,” the spokesperson said.
